items.title: Harris says it was ‘recklessness’ to defer to Bidens on reelection decision
items.description: In her forthcoming memoir, Harris also writes about not feeling supported by Biden’s staff, who she said “rarely” defended her.

items.title: Trump blames Democrats for Charlotte stabbing. Records complicate the story.
items.description: The case has sharpened partisan divisions about an intractable root of crime: how to treat the seriously mentally ill who pose risks of violence.

items.title: Democrats fight over how to defeat Republican Sen. Susan Collins
items.description: The emerging Democratic primary for the U.S. Senate in Maine embodies a stark choice in a party trying to remake itself.
